CustomField.description: This is used for search layout and providing more details to identify duplicate accounts.
CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = 'Vanguard', 'Vanguard', 'Black Diamond') + ' (' + Owner.FirstName + ' ' + Owner.LastName + ' - ' + BillingCity + ', '+ BillingState + ')'
CustomField.label: Record Summary
